allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Infografis and Pengumuman pages with media gallery functionality

- Created InfografisPage Livewire component for image gallery display
  - Grid layout with search and sort functionality
  - Image preview with modal detail view
  - Pagination support (12 items per page)
  - Statistics sidebar showing recent uploads
  
- Created PengumumanPage Livewire component for document listings
  - Table layout for mixed media types (PDF, images, documents)
  - File type icons for non-image files
  - PDF preview in modal with iframe
  - Pagination support (10 items per page)
  
- Updated routes to include both pages under /informasi path
- Removed deprecated FolderGalleryPage in favor of specific pages
- Updated Navigation model to remove folder relationship
- Enhanced dynamic page routing structure
